author: Todd Haselton
title: Facebook's Portal TV video chat device was mocked — now it's completely sold out
description: Critics mocked the Facebook Portal TV when it launched, largely because it seemed silly to put a Facebook camera and microphone in our homes. Now it's sold out.
content:
You can read stories using the Facebook Portal TV.
When Facebook launched the Portal TV video chat system in November, critics quickly shot down the idea of putting a Facebook camera and microphone in their homes. Reviewers, including me, worried that Facebo… [+3410 chars]
